DOC.detailed_description: A multicenter prospective cohort inborn preterm infant , born 8 public university NICU Brazil , birthweight 1000-1499 g , without malformation , intubate 15 minute life . Preterm infant randomly assign birth early treatment group ( DR-CPAP ) , CPAP 5 cm water pressure apply within 15 minute birth Neopuff , routine group ( RG ) , CPAP apply indicate assistant physician . After transfer NICU , nasal CPAP maintain Hudson prong
